SMC for Bilateral Blindness With L/LOU of a Lower Extremity Considered Less Than 50-Percent Disabling
A Veteran is entitled to an additional one-half step of SMC under
38 CFR 3.350(f)(2)(vii)(C)
if the SC disabilities include
visual acuity of 5/200 (1.5/60) or less, bilaterally
L/LOU of a foot, considered less than 50-percent disabling, and
no other compensable SC disability.
Note
:Â  The level of SMC may not exceed that provided by
38 U.S.C. 1114(o)
.
